page.title: 20ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
page.content: TO MR E READ WHO SORTED OUT THE COMPUTER SNAGS. TO MISS K GORDON ,WILLIAM HAMILTON,AND MANY OTHER RESIDENTS WHO TOLD US ABOUT THE CHANGES IN THE VILLAGE. TO WENDY FERGUSON,AND CHRISTIAN BAILEY FOR REPORTS ON GUIDES AND SCOUTS. SARA-LEIGH DICKIE,ANDREW TWEEDIE,SARAH NICHOLSON,LESLEY-ANN BALLANTINE, ALASTAIR COATES,GAIL McNIFF,GAYLE TROTTER,STEPHEN WILLIS,JULIA WOODRUFF RACHEL DICKSON,PAUL CROSSAN,ANNETTE DEARIE,EDWARD BAILEY,ROBERT SMITH,NIALL DUFFY,ROBERT BLACK,JAMES ASTON ,SARAH-JANE STEWART,BROOK MARTIN NORMAN BRAMMER, JAMES TAYLOR,JIM HUNTER,IAN McLEOD,PAUL GILLESPIE,ALAN CATHCART,ALL PUPILS OF PRIMARIES 4 AND 5 AT KILCREGGAN SCHOOL.
